  • Else when <IdentityDocumentType> = “MI” then the corresponding <IdentityDocumentNumber>

    • | |paxType|`pnrretrieve`|`.....`|

    • When <PTC> = “INF” then “INFANT“ else “OTHER“

    | |segmentReferenceId|`pnrretrieve`|`.....`| | |segmentStatus|`pnrretrieve`|`......`|

    • When <FlightSegmentType> = “OK” then “ACTIVE“

    • When <FlightSegmentType> = “WK” then “WK CONFIRMED“
